actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1808.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 13750) to implement the International Sugar Agreement between the United States and foreign countries; to protect the welfare of consumers of sugar and those engaged in the domestic sugar-producing industry; to promote the export trade of the United States; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 13750 ( A bill to implement the International Sugar Agreement between the United States and foreign countries).

titles.title: A resolution waiving points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 13750) to implement the International Sugar Agreement between the United States and foreign countries; to protect the welfare of consumers of sugar and those engaged in the domestic sugar-producing industry; to promote the export trade of the United States; and for other purposes.
